DOC.criteria: age 18 year old singleton pregnancy 37 week gestation cephalic presentation reassure fetal heart rate pattern admission labor induction due medical obstetrical condition bishop score less 6 give consent sign consent form study parity 3 estimate fetal weight 3,500 gram nonreassuring fetal heart rate pattern contraindication vaginal delivery previous uterine scar suspect abruptio placenta nonreassuring fetal heart rate pattern abnormal bleed per vagina , except bloody show PROM underlie cardiac , hepatic , renal disease history allergy misoprostol prostaglandin analogues cervical dilatation 3 centimeter uterine contraction 3 time 10 minute
